message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your split seems unfair considering the money loses value faster for you. I propose a 55-45 split.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Alice, this is a serious offer. It accounts for the inflation and is a fair deal. Let's settle this before we both lose more.
I understand we're both losing value, but I'm losing more. Meet me in the middle and let's end this.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.  Take it or leave it, but we both lose out if this continues.
